column4: hi i was wondering how i would go about changing the colors etc, of an ubuntu install?
can linux be skinned like windows?
what do you want changed? because everything can pretty much be changed to look like you want it to with enough tweaking
ok, i'll try helping you then, what do you want changed and have you visited http://www.gnome-look.org yet?
there's a plethora of options, from a terminal type "sudo apt-get install gnome-art"
once that's done you should have system->preferences->art manager
what's the problem? cant install it?
you download it, then use system-administration-login screen setup to install it
